header.rec_loc: At the family home in Harston, Cambridgeshire.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Discussing a film we’d been to see at the cinema, a recent debate held In Cambridge about how to teach history, politicians, discussion about the current national curriculum in England, talking about one’s education at school. Talking about how to organise Higher Education degrees, and linked to industry based experience.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
